description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. IGF 2010 build. Crimson Blues is an action puzzle-platform where the player is able to shift between red and blue modes, gaining new abilities when interacting with different colored objects. The game features a full tutorial mode leading up to the single player game, as well as a 2 player gameplay with unlockable extras and new modes.
